name: Mini-Envelope card holder
description: These genuine leather envelopes are great for keeping important business cards, bank cards and ID cards safe. They come with a metal ring that can be used for attaching to keys or a bag - or attach to a leather string & wear as an accessory!

name: iPad Sleeve
description:
We loved designing and making this i-pad sleeve so much, we got an iPad just so we'd have an excuse to carry it around!

Made with full-grain genuine leather and our signature African-print cloth print for accent. Padded for extra protection. Built in stand and a sleeve on the inside for important stuff like business cards and notes.

Colours: Navy, Red or Black
Dimensions: 15,6 x 21 cm

Made to Order: 2-3 weeks

Please allow 10 working days for delivery.

name: Leather Satchel
description:
Hand-stitched genuine leather satchel great with adjustable strap, front pocket and leather divider. The design is inspired by classic, vintage leather satchels while maintaining a contemporary aesthetic. Perfect for carrying books, laptops and other important items that form a part of our busy lives.

*Features*
Colour: Acorn
Adjustable strap
Interior divider to separate laptop from additional items
1 zip pocket to house accessories
--------------------------------------
After this item has been dispatched, please allow 10 working days for delivery.

name: Slim Satchel
description:
This elegant Slim briefcase is a perfect fit for your every day, on-the-move essentials such as your laptop and power cord accompanied by a book, magazine or diary for good measure without compromising its streamline design. It can be worn with equal comfort either on the shoulder or in hand courtesy of its sturdy strap and handle. This light weight briefcase is crafted using full-grain natural leather and lined with African-print fabric for accent.

--------------------------------------
*Features*
Colours: Navy
Dimensions: Height 280mm / Length 375mm / Width 80mm
One size fits all
Reinforced padding throughout
Interior divider to separate laptop from additional items
3 padded pockets to house accessories
--------------------------------------

name: Laptop Envelope
description:
This vintage inspired, envelope-style laptop sleeve is made with full-grain, genuine leather. Sleeves are lined with African print cotton fabric. For Macbook and PC. Please add a note with laptop size and make!
-------------------------------
**features**
- Available in redwood.
- 13” and 15” sizes.
- Lightweight and easy to carry.
- Can be used as an A4 portfolio sleeve or document holder.
- Padded for extra protection!
-------------------------------

We wil gladly customize the design to size! Please send us an email with laptop make and year purchased.

Please allow 10 working days for delivery from dispatched date.

Contact us: hello [!at] kushn.co.za
visit our blog: www.kushn.tumblr.com
or website: www.kushn.co.za (launching soon)

Please allow 10 working days for delivery.
